review: With this handy dongle, I never have to watch television again. I just download the apps onto my iPhone and then stream through the Chromecast. It's also very easy to connect the Chromecast to my laptop through Google Chrome, although the buffer time seems to be a tad longer when I use Google Chrome as opposed to the apps on my phone.
